channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 08:30 Driven anxiety in the Odesa region. Stop by further messages.
item.description: 游릭 08:30 Driven anxiety in the Odesa region. Stop by further messages.#Odessa_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 08:28 Plowing of anxiety in Kharkiv region. Consider that anxiety is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lauda territorial community- Vovchansk Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 08:28 Plowing of anxiety in Kharkiv region. Consider that anxiety is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lauda territorial community- Vovchansk Territorial Community#Kharkiv_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 08:28 Failure to Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. Full attention, the alarm is still in:- Manganese and Marganets Territorial Community- Mirorsk Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivka Territorial Community
